_comment: Cardinal Engine Configuration File. Note: Standard JSON does not support comments, so we use _comment fields which are ignored by the engine.
_comment_assets: Path to the assets directory containing shaders, textures, models, etc.
_comment_memory: Memory management settings. memory_size is in bytes (4MB default).
_comment_async: Async loader settings. Threads for background loading and queue size.
_comment_cache: Size of the asset cache (number of items).
